resources.string: Please make sure setup process was completed correctly.

"### Welcome to FD Music! 
Welcome to the beta test of FD Music, an application to simplify the handling of your training music. 

After a few simple setup steps the app is ready to use. This wizard will guide you through the process."

### File Access \nFD Music will save the music and some metadata on the phones storage. Therefore we need storage permission. Please press the button below and confirm the following permission dialog.

### Setup completed! 
All done! **Please reopen the App after pressing the finish button.** 

We wish you much fun using our app!
### Passphrase! \nAs the music is not to be distributed beyond our group, hence we must protect access. Please enter the password you got from the team.
You have to grand requested permissions to finish the setup.
You have to read and accept the data contribution agreements
